about_the_game:
Happy Holidays!

We've put together a Holiday bundle, just for you!

A bundle with ALL 4 of the new DLC packs are available at a special price - just in time for the Holidays!
Purchase to get all 4 DLCs (Lenox, William, Rozzi, Jackie) for even cheaper!

Holday Subject - Lenox:
  • Character: Lenox
  • Skin: Mistletoe Lenox
  • Emote: 2 Holiday Lenox Emotes

Holday Subject - William:
  • Character: William
  • Skin: Snow Game William
  • Emote: 2 Holiday William Emotes

Holiday Subject - Rozzi:
  • Character : Rozzi
  • Skin : Black Rose Rozzi
  • Emote : 2 Christmas Rozzi Emotes

Holiday Subject - Jackie:
  • Character: Jackie
  • Skin: Scarlet Corsage Jackie
  • Emote: 2 Christmas Jackie Emotes

*If you already own the characters and skins included in this DLC, you will receive a refund at the discount price of the character (A-Coin) and Skin(NP). Check your mailbox to receive the A-Coin and NP.

How to receive:

  • In the main menu click on 'STORE'
  • ’Select tab: DLC
  • ’Click on the button: GET REWARD
  • You will receive the listed products of the DLC pack that you purchased.
detailed_description:
Happy Holidays!

We've put together a Holiday bundle, just for you!

A bundle with ALL 4 of the new DLC packs are available at a special price - just in time for the Holidays!
Purchase to get all 4 DLCs (Lenox, William, Rozzi, Jackie) for even cheaper!

Holday Subject - Lenox:
  • Character: Lenox
  • Skin: Mistletoe Lenox
  • Emote: 2 Holiday Lenox Emotes

Holday Subject - William:
  • Character: William
  • Skin: Snow Game William
  • Emote: 2 Holiday William Emotes

Holiday Subject - Rozzi:
  • Character : Rozzi
  • Skin : Black Rose Rozzi
  • Emote : 2 Christmas Rozzi Emotes

Holiday Subject - Jackie:
  • Character: Jackie
  • Skin: Scarlet Corsage Jackie
  • Emote: 2 Christmas Jackie Emotes

*If you already own the characters and skins included in this DLC, you will receive a refund at the discount price of the character (A-Coin) and Skin(NP). Check your mailbox to receive the A-Coin and NP.

How to receive:

  • In the main menu click on 'STORE'
  • ’Select tab: DLC
  • ’Click on the button: GET REWARD
  • You will receive the listed products of the DLC pack that you purchased.

name: Eternal Return Holiday Character Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225, AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640, ATI Radeon HD 7700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K , AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB . AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
